meanings.definition: A team sport played with a small rubber ball and long-handled sticks.
meanings.sent1: In lacrosse, players use long sticks to catch and throw the ball.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys playing lacrosse with her friends after school.
meanings.sent3: The lacrosse game got so intense that the ball flew into the neighbor's yard!
meanings.sent4: His skills in lacrosse are like a well-oiled machine on the field.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the lacrosse ball hitting the net echoed across the field.

meanings.definition: The long-handled stick used in the game of lacrosse.
meanings.sent1: He bought a new lacrosse to improve his game.
meanings.sent2: The lacrosse was beautifully crafted with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally mistook the lacrosse for a broom and tried to sweep the floor with it!
meanings.sent4: His lacrosse was an extension of his arm during the game.
meanings.sent5: The lacrosse felt sturdy and reliable in his hands as he prepared to play.
